it.polimi.se2019.model.game

Class PlayerBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • it.polimi.se2019.model.game.PlayerBoard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class PlayerBoard
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.io.Serializable
    this class represents the single player board and it also includes the ActionTile, if the frenzy is null it's in normal playing mode, otherwise it's in frenzy mode. It also includes the player's hand, with guncards and powerups
    See Also:

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void activateFrenzy(int actions)
      This method "flips" only the action board, creating a frenzy one and dumping the normal one
      PlayerBoard clone() 
      void decreaseBoardValue()
      This method decreases the board value during the game A fresh front playerboard is worth 8,6,4,2,1,1 points A fresh back playerboard is worth 4,2,1,1,1 points
      void flipPlayerBoard()
      This method "flips only the player board, having its value start at 4
